title: I LOVE LISTS
description: I LOVE LISTS Autocado is fun today. Why do cats knock things over? Let’s learn about bread tags. A-frame houses are so fascinating to me. I want to play around with sweet potatoes. How long does brie last after you’ve opened it? What happens when you get sick on a cruise? Croissant lamps made with real croissants. Let’s look at how amazing the ocean is. Now let’s look at old photos. Postcard magic! Leopard: robe/pendant/clogs The world is a weird place. We call rotisserie chicken, rotissy. 1960s sunglasses were so fun. Let’s learn about the Cristal Bic pen. These anti-cheating hats are hilarious. Pics of Einstein’s office right after he died. Why we love looking at paintings of food. Weekend baking: Baked Apples with Oat Crumble On this week’s episode of Keep Grief Weird, we discuss the 6th stage of grief (as added by David Kessler)- Finding Meaning. It’s a task that unfolds over time in the grief process. Follow us on Substack for show notes! The post I LOVE LISTS appeared first on Shutterbean.
excerpt: Welcome to I LOVE LISTS. It's Friday and Tracy of Shutterbean.com shares her finds from the internet on a weekly list called I LOVE LISTS!
text: Natalie September 22, 2024 The blue BIC Cristal pen is my favorite pen of all time. The history video is so cool. My grandparents lived a couple miles from the Bic headquarters at the time in Milford, CT. Reply
html:
Natalie September 22, 2024

The blue BIC Cristal pen is my favorite pen of all time. The history video is so cool. My grandparents lived a couple miles from the Bic headquarters at the time in Milford, CT.
